LanguageData.OE_Colonist.title: obsidia colonist
LanguageData.OE_Colonist.description: [PAWN_nameDef] completed Obsidia Colonists course. Possesses all the necessary skills to support life in the colony.
LanguageData.OE_Worker.title: obsidia worker
LanguageData.OE_Worker.description: [PAWN_nameDef] completed course Obsidia Workers course. Possesses all the necessary skills to build a colony and extract useful resources.
LanguageData.OE_Scientist.title: obsidia scientist
LanguageData.OE_Scientist.description: [PAWN_nameDef] completed Obsidia Scientists course. Possesses all the necessary skills for the development and improvement the colony.
LanguageData.OE_Artisan.title: obsidia artisan
LanguageData.OE_Artisan.description: [PAWN_nameDef] mastered the arts of form and function in Obsidia’s creative guilds. Able to turn even discarded scrap into breathtaking works. Has an eye for beauty, but little interest in fieldwork.
LanguageData.OE_Trader.title: obsidia trader
LanguageData.OE_Trader.description: [PAWN_nameDef] traveled between scattered Obsidia enclaves, negotiating deals and uncovering rare goods. Learned to read people well—but rarely touched a tool or weapon.
LanguageData.OE_Caretaker.title: obsidia caretaker
LanguageData.OE_Caretaker.description: [PAWN_nameDef] devoted years to caring for Obsidia’s wounded, orphans, and beasts of burden. Soft-spoken and patient, but ill-suited for combat roles.
LanguageData.OE_Scholar.title: obsidia scholar
LanguageData.OE_Scholar.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent countless hours in databanks and echo-archives, studying Obsidia’s forgotten legacies. Brilliant with theory—awkward with social and tools.
LanguageData.OE_Engineer.title: obsidia engineer
LanguageData.OE_Engineer.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked on critical infrastructure during the collapse of the Obsidia core systems. Skilled at building and repairing, but tends to avoid social entanglements.
LanguageData.OE_Psy.title: obsidia psycaster
LanguageData.OE_Psy.description: [PAWN_nameDef] representative of one of the ancient genera of Obsidia. Instead of participating in political clashes for power, chose the path of conquering new lands. Has excellent intellectual abilities and a sense of beauty.
LanguageData.OE_Mindseeker.title: obsidia mindseeker
LanguageData.OE_Mindseeker.description: [PAWN_nameDef] representative of Obsidia spiritual circles. Dedicated their life to inner harmony, healing, and understanding the unseen. Gifted in speech and medicine.
LanguageData.OE_Mechanitor.title: obsidia mechanitor
LanguageData.OE_Mechanitor.description: [PAWN_nameDef] representative of one of the most popular Obsidia mecha fan clubs. Becoming a full-fledged mechanitor is able to reveal hiden potential. Possesses excellent creative skills.
LanguageData.OE_Mecharchitect.title: obsidia mech-architect
LanguageData.OE_Mecharchitect.description: [PAWN_nameDef] former employee of Obsidia robotics foundries. Specialized in chassis design and autonomous systems. Possesses outstanding artistic talent.
LanguageData.OE_Soldier_Melee.title: obsidia warrior
LanguageData.OE_Soldier_Melee.description: [PAWN_nameDef] completed combat Obsidia Warriors courses. Trained in close combat and medicine to keep his comrades healthy.
LanguageData.OE_Soldier_MeleePsy.title: obsidia warpriest
LanguageData.OE_Soldier_MeleePsy.description: [PAWN_nameDef] underwent intensive combat and psi-training under the Obsidia Inquisition. Trained to inspire allies and eliminate enemies with righteous fury. Skilled in melee combat and social influence.
LanguageData.OE_Soldier_Ranged.title: obsidia gunner
LanguageData.OE_Soldier_Ranged.description: [PAWN_nameDef] completed combat Obsidia Gunners courses. Trained in ranged combat and construction skills to maintain vehicles and buildings.
LanguageData.OE_Soldier_RangedPsy.title: obsidia reaver
LanguageData.OE_Soldier_RangedPsy.description: [PAWN_nameDef] descendant of Obsidia nobility who chose the path of a psi-warrior. Completed specialized military training focused on precision and tactical superiority. Highly skilled in ranged combat and intellectual pursuits.
